Item ID12253

The Armadyl robe top is part of a Vestment set and can be obtained by completing easy Treasure Trails. To wear, the player requires a minimum of level 20 Prayer.

 Attack bonuses

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
24 July 2014
(update | poll)

Vestment robe tops and legs now offer the same prayer bonuses as monk robes.
